wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Christopher Ewart (1799 – 14 December 1868) was a British Liberal and Whig politician.He was elected Whig MP for Liverpool at a by-election in 1855—caused by the succession of Henry Liddell to 2nd Baron Ravensworth—and held the seat until 1865 when he was defeated.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1857 United Kingdom general election

response: The 1855 Liverpool by-election was held on 29 March 1855 after the incumbent Conservative MP Henry Liddell succeeded to the peerage as Baron Ravensworth.  The election was won by the Whig candidate Joseph Christopher Ewart.
